Description:
Inspection by Private Appointment
Smart, Spacious Family Living
Please ensure you also scroll through to the bottom of this ad to see our COVID-19 Property Inspection Policy!
Literally a few moments walk from Victoria University, schools, shopping and open parkland, this contemporary home offers dynamic lifestyle opportunities. Radiant sunshine from the north illuminates the length of the family dining and living with an alfresco backdrop to entertain easily among low-maintenance gardens.
_stained bamboo floors float openly through an expansive semi-formal lounge
_spaces for living and dining are drenched in magnificent sunlight and superbly proportioned
_geometric stone island/breakfast bar surrounded by generous kitchen cabinetry including walk-in pantry
_fabulous patio entertains undercover with attractively low-maintenance garden
_additional rumpus room upstairs offers a fabulous kids retreat
_arranged for up to five bedrooms all with fitted robes and a desirable amount of light
_three stylish bathrooms include an equally attractive ensuite to the master bedroom
_exceptionally generous storage throughout
_large laundry with external access
_ducted heating, cooling and double-glazed comfort throughout
_enjoy Kevin Flint Reserves green pathways and sparkling lake
_surrounded by a wide selection of schools and childcare
COVID-19 Property Inspection Policy
We take the health and well-being of our Team Members, Clients and the Community very seriously. Thats why weve developed a strict Condition of Entry Policy at our Inspections and Auctions, as follows:
_Social distancing of at least 1.5 mtrs from others
_No touching of any item or surface within the property
_Practicing good hygiene (with sanitisers, gloves and masks where available)
If you fall into any of the below categories, please just stay at home and have a rest!
_Are unwell with any flu-like symptoms
_Have been tested for and are awaiting results or have been confirmed positive for Covid-19
_Have been in contact with anybody who is being tested for or has been confirmed to have or have had Covid-19
_Have returned from overseas in the past 14 days
If you fall into these categories, rest assured, we are more than happy to give you a virtual property tour or make other arrangements instead. Just contact us to make arrangements!

A Luxurious Oasis of Innovative Design and Sophisticated Style

Walking distance to Keilor Road trams and cafes, Niddrie Shopping Centre, close to some of the area's most popular primary and secondary schools, as well as easy access to the Calder Freeway and other major arterials.
